ValidationRule.description: to throw error if VAT Number is changed by a use other than finance for opps where VAT status = Confirmed Initial Creation : GTMS-16029 GTMS-28416: Added a condition CurrencyIsoCode = 'MXN' to include Mexico
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( ISPICKVAL(CurrencyIsoCode,'EUR'), ISPICKVAL(CurrencyIsoCode,'GBP'), ISPICKVAL(CurrencyIsoCode,'MXN') ), ISPICKVAL(VAT_Validation_Status__c,'Confirmed'), ISCHANGED(VAT_Number__c), CASESAFEID($Profile.Id) != '00e1a000000dxEqAAI',/*System Admin API*/ CASESAFEID($Profile.Id) != '00e1a000000UoNcAAK',/*System Admin*/ CASESAFEID($Profile.Id) != '00e1a000000i8JHAAY',/*Samsara Finance*/ CASESAFEID($Profile.Id) != '00e4p000001FKPaAAO'/*Samsara Finance Admin*/ )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: VAT Number can only be updated by Finance
